decisions.description: When client cancels via SMS and SDRs who monitor SMS set Cancelled disposition , it should not be marked with Error.
decisions.name: Cancelled_by_SMS
decisions.label: Cancelled by SMS?

decisions.description: Checks if Appointment Setter or SDR Manager Cancelled a Live TSA or Regular TSA or BNA
decisions.name: SDR_Cancelled_Event_check
decisions.label: SDR Cancelled Event check

decisions.description: Checks to see if there are any validation rule errors
decisions.name: Validation_Errors
decisions.label: Validation Errors

decisions.description: Determines whether the Who ID is a Lead or Contact
decisions.name: Who_ID
decisions.label: Who ID

formulas.description: Error Condition is True if Disposition or Secondary Disposition is changed Later than a Business Day (later than 30 days later for Sales Manager or Role SDR Manager) for TSA BNA Formation Consultation or Calendar Block Appt type.
formulas.name: After24Hrs_TsaBnaFormationCalblock

formulas.description: Append Subject with “- Error” at the end
formulas.name: Append_Error_to_Subject
Cancelled_Disposition
formulas.expression: IF( AND( NOT({!$Profile.Name} = "System Admin"), NOT({!$Profile.Name} = "SDR Manager"), NOT({!$Profile.Name} = "Appointment Setter"), NOT({!$Profile.Name} = "API User"), NOT({!$Profile.Name} = "System Administrator") , NOT(ISBLANK( {!Disposition_Fields.middleValue} )), {!Disposition_Fields.middleValue}="Cancelled"), true, false)

formulas.description: Error condition is true if Disposition of a TSA is changed from 'Rescheduled' or 'Cancelled'
formulas.name: Disp_Changed_From_Rescheduled_Cancelled
formulas.expression:
AND( {!Disposition_Fields.middleValue} != TEXT({!GetEvent.Appointment_Disposition__c}) , /*Disposition is changed*/ ISPICKVAL( {!GetEvent.Type_of_Appointment__c} , 'Tax Savings Analysis'), OR( TEXT({!GetEvent.Appointment_Disposition__c}) = 'Rescheduled', TEXT({!GetEvent.Appointment_Disposition__c} )= 'Cancelled'), /*Changed from Rescheduled or Cancelled*/
/*Exception - Admins*/ NOT( {!$Permission.Admin_Validation_Rule_Override} ) )

formulas.description: Error condition is True if a TSA that is more than 5 minutes in future is Dispositioned. Exception - Admins and SDRs
formulas.name: Dispostion_Future_TSA

formulas.description: Error condition returns true if TSA is Dispositioned as Consulted-Follow up on Lead (Allowed only after lead is converted)
formulas.name: DispTSA_Consulted_FollowUp_On_Lead

formulas.description: Error condition is true if Secondary Disposition is Dupe (for non Admins)
formulas.name: Dupe_Sec_Disposition
formulas.expression: AND( OR( ISPICKVAL( {!GetEvent.Type_of_Appointment__c} , 'Tax Savings Analysis'), ISPICKVAL( {!GetEvent.Type_of_Appointment__c} , 'Formation Consultation'), ISPICKVAL( {!GetEvent.Type_of_Appointment__c} , 'BNA') ), NOT({!$Permission.Admin_Validation_Rule_Override}), {!Disposition_Fields.bottomValue} = 'Dupe')

formulas.description: Error condition is True if the Disposition set to or changed from "Failure to Call?"
formulas.name: Failure_to_Call_Disposition

formulas.description: Simeon and Terri monitor SMS and Cancel BNAs not assigned to them if a client cancels through SMS
formulas.name: formCancelDueToSMS

formulas.description: Error condition is true if secondary Disposition is "Not Interested" or "Cancelled" and Rejection Reason is blank.
formulas.name: Rejection_Reason_Blank

formulas.description: Returns the string Campaign(Text) with SDR Live Transfer removed - Used in the flow to remove SDR Live Transfer from Campaign field
formulas.name: Remove_Campaign_SDRLiveTransfer
Rescheduled_Disposition
formulas.expression: IF( AND( OR( ISPICKVAL( {!GetEvent.Type_of_Appointment__c} , 'Tax Savings Analysis'), ISPICKVAL( {!GetEvent.Type_of_Appointment__c} , 'Formation Consultation'), ISPICKVAL( {!GetEvent.Type_of_Appointment__c} , 'BNA') ), NOT({!$Permission.Admin_Validation_Rule_Override}), {!Disposition_Fields.middleValue} = 'Rescheduled'), true, false)

formulas.description: Is the Secondary Disposition Rescheduled or Dupe?
formulas.name: Rescheduled_Secondary_Disposition
formulas.expression: IF( AND( OR( ISPICKVAL( {!GetEvent.Type_of_Appointment__c} , 'Tax Savings Analysis'), ISPICKVAL( {!GetEvent.Type_of_Appointment__c} , 'Formation Consultation'), ISPICKVAL( {!GetEvent.Type_of_Appointment__c} , 'BNA') ), NOT({!$Permission.Admin_Validation_Rule_Override}), {!Disposition_Fields.bottomValue} = 'Rescheduled' ), true, false)

formulas.description: Is the User an SDR and the Disposition "Consulted?"
formulas.name: SDR_Consulted_Disposition

fields.name: Cancelled_Error_Text
fields.fieldText:
ERROR:


You cannot mark this event as 'Cancelled.'


Please select an allowed Disposition and try again.

fields.name: Rescheduled_Error_Text
fields.fieldText:
ERROR:


You cannot mark this event as 'Rescheduled.'


Please use the Universal Scheduler to reschedule this appointment﻿.

fields.name: Failure_to_Call_Error_Text
fields.fieldText:
ERROR:


Only Admins or QA can mark Disposition as or change Disposition from 'Failure to Call'.


Please select an allowed Disposition and try again.

fields.name: SDR_Consulted_Error_Alert
fields.fieldText:
ERROR:


SDRs cannot use the 'Consulted' disposition.


Please select an allowed value and try again﻿.

fields.name: ChangeAfter24Hrs_ErrorText
fields.fieldText:
ERROR :


You cannot change the Dispositions for TSA, BNA, Formation or Calendar Block Type after 24 Hrs.

fields.name: Rejection_Reason_Blank_For_NotInterested
fields.fieldText:
ERROR :


Rejection Reason is required when secondary disposition is 'Not Interested' or 'Cancelled'.

fields.name: ErrorMsgTSAConsultedFollowUpOnLead
fields.fieldText:
ERROR :


You cannot disposition a TSA or Formation Consultation as 'Consulted - Follow Up' until the Lead has been converted.

fields.name: Disposition_future_TSA_Error
fields.fieldText:
ERROR :


You cannot Disposition a TSA that is in the future.

fields.name: Rescheduled_Cancelled_Changed
fields.fieldText:
ERROR :


You cannot change the Disposition from 'Rescheduled' or 'Cancelled'. Please exit this Disposition window.

fields.name: Display_Dupe_Error
fields.fieldText:
ERROR:


Only Admins can mark this event as 'Consulted - Dupe'

variables.description: Text variable to hold the values of the Campaign Multi Select Picklist
variables.name: var_Campaign_Values
